rows.label: tlk70000016_02_msg0001
rows.name: What d'you guys think I should do?

rows.label: tlk70000016_02_msg0002
rows.name:
My grandma and grandpa pray
to the gods of Acedia

rows.label: tlk70000016_02_msg0003
rows.name:
But my parents are always
going on about Iiran science
and technology...

rows.label: tlk70000016_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Which of them is right?
I'm really lost...

rows.label: tlk70000016_02_msg0005
rows.name:
What?! You mean that there's
not one right answer? They
could BOTH be right?!

rows.label: tlk70000016_02_msg0006
rows.name:
I guess that makes sense, though.
Science and religion both make people
happy, so neither one is wrong.

rows.label: tlk70000016_02_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm gonna go talk to my family
about this right away!
